title: Teff Peanut Butter Cookies
directions: Mix together flour and salt. Set aside.
Combine the coconut oil with the remaining ingredients in a mixer. When well blended, add the dry ingredients.
Drop by rounded spoonfuls on a greased baking sheet. Flatten with a fork.
Bake in 350 degree oven for 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups of teff flour, brown or white
